data.text: @mother3bears Growing up… those were the days…

@ANJGilbertson He's come out and said sorry, kind of. Not really. But kind of. I am just going to be a bit stoney/less caring about him and his girlfriend. They can go jump in the sea. https://t.co/kAxUt9Y7R7
@mother3bears That lovely boy is still there. They just have no brains to understand. He will get it one day. But good god parenting isn't easy.
@roscobigfulla He's a bit thick. His stunted teenage brain sees no wrong done. I am withdrawing all mothering duties. He'll feel sad when he runs out of undies.

@mother3bears That’s as it should be. I was hoping he’d support you in this-which is as it should be. Man, if I’d have ever chipped my Mum like that the sword of Damacles would have descended super quick. Expect an extremely contrite & sincere apology at the least
@collekins88 Nah, he's oblivious. His dad has had words with him.
@mother3bears Kick him out… that’ll learn him…
